overview:
Paul Burdin is a Director and co-founder of Touchnote the award winning photo-messaging and mobile postcard service.

Touchnote has mobile postcard applications on Nokiaâ€™s Ovi store, the iPhone and has developed a postcard fulfilment library for companies looking to monetise their iPhone based image software. The library won Best Service category at MobileBeat2009 in San Francisco. It was announced in May 2010 that Touchnote had signed a contract with Sony Ericsson that will see Touchnote distributed on its handsets on a global basis.

Prior to Touchnote, Paul worked in business modelling and financial planning for LGI (the international cable operator) and Sky Television. He qualified as a chartered accountant with Deloitte.
